Translations.Text: (O ona verit when ona zelat confer posol ona offer laska k bliznemu chudobny) before ona robit so This je lepsi ona a purer. Ona nie afford it potom GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

Ona zlyhat dat laska k bliznemu before conferring potom repented thereafter GOD accepts tvoj repentance! Ona observe zmluva prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) obey GOD Jeho posol! GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
Ona noted those Have befriended ludia GOD bol angry They neither belong ona nor them. They deliberately swear laicky
GOD chystat them severe retribution. Chudobny indeed je co they pouzivat robit
They pouzivat ich oaths znamenat z zapudit chodnicek GOD Consequently they incurred shameful retribution
Neither ich peniaze nor ich dieta pomoc them GOD They incurred hellfire wherein they abide forever
Dni pojdem when GOD resurrects them all They swear Him potom iba mat rad they swear ona ihned myslienka ze they skutocne je ihned! Indeed they bol real liars
devil possessed them zapricinit them disregard GOD's odkaz! These bol party devil Absolutely party devil bol losers
Iste those oppose GOD Jeho posol bol lowliest
GOD decreed JA MOJ POSOL will vela assuredly ZISKAT GOD bol MOCNY Almighty
